introduction: Hello and welcome to Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology (VIIT)! ðŸŽ“I'm your friendly college chatbot here to assist you with any questions you may have about our institution. Whether you're a prospective student exploring admissions, a current student seeking information about campus life, or an alum with nostalgia for your college days, I'm here to help.

admissions_guidance.description: Learn about our admission process, requirements, and application deadlines.

academic_information.description: Explore our diverse range of undergraduate and graduate programs, majors, and academic resources.

financial_aid_and_tuition.description: Discover details about financial aid options, scholarships, and information on tuition and fees.

campus_life.description: Get insights into the vibrant life on our campus, including housing, extracurricular activities, and student organizations.

support_services.description: Find information on academic support, career services, health and wellness resources, and more.

events_and_activities.description: Stay updated on campus events, social activities, and opportunities to engage with the college community.

technology_and_facilities.description: Learn about our state-of-the-art facilities, technology resources, and modern laboratories.

international_students.description: Access information and support services tailored to the needs of international students.

alumni_connections.description: Connect with successful alumni, learn about their experiences, and discover networking opportunities.

general_inquiries.description: Feel free to ask me anything, and I'll do my best to provide you with accurate and helpful information.

about_chatbot.creator: The students of the third year in the Department of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, batch of 2025
about_chatbot.aim: To provide users with insightful and accurate information related to the college.
about_chatbot.availability: Should you have any inquiries or require assistance, please feel free to ask, and we will do our utmost to provide you with the information you seek.
